Description:
Detects potential in-memory downloading and compiling of applets using curl and osacompile as seen used by XCSSET malware

Author: Sohan G (D4rkCiph3r), Red Canary (idea)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential In-Memory Download And Compile Of Payloads
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%osacompile%' and command like '%curl%')
